name: Blastoise
specialText: When the Pokemon is at half HP or less, its Attack and Special Attack increase.
basicAttack: Blastoise’s third auto attack is empowered - dealing 3 instances of damage, slowing enemies hit and reducing Blastoise’s move cooldowns by 1 second each.

skills.name: Water Gun
skills.effect: shoots a jet of water in a straight line, damaging, stunning, and knocking back enemies hit. Enemies hit are also slowed for 1 second.

skills.name: Hydro Pump
skills.effect: Shoots a large amount of water; damaging, stunning, and knocking back enemies hit.

skills.name: Water Spout
skills.effect: Blastoise calls down a barrage of water in a targeted radius. Enemies within the radius are struck 6 times over its duration, damaging and slowing them

skills.name: Skull Bash
skills.effect: Dashes forward damaging and stunning all enemies hit.

skills.name: Surf
skills.effect: Blastoise rides a large wave in the designated direction, damaging, stunning, and knocking back enemies hit. Blastoise is unstoppable while surfing. The wave continues for a short duration after Blastoise has leapt off and continues to knock back enemies hit but inflicts no damage
skills.upgrades: Gains small shield when surf lands on an enemy.

skills.name: Rapid Spin
skills.effect: Blastoise withdraws into its shell and begins rapidly spinning, resetting the cooldown of its other move. Blastoise is unstoppable for the duration of Rapid Spin and can freely move about the battlefield. While spinning, Blastoise will damage and slow nearby enemies. Blastoise’s next basic attack after Rapid Spin ends is empowered. For the duration of Rapid Spin, the mechanics of Blastoise’s Basic attacks as well as Hydro Pump and Water Spout are changed.
skills.upgrades: Blastoise gains a massive amount of Def and SpDef for the duration of Rapid Spin.

skills.name: Hydro Typhoo
skills.effect: Has the user spout water to attack while spinning, throwing enemies in a large area. This also grants the user a shield.

changeLogs.changes: Added Passive Skill name and effect. Updated Moves section.
Added hyperlinks to each moves to for players to get a preview of the move's animation.
